description:
One of Dr. K`s robots, Attractix, runs away from his lair, infected with Solex, and heads straight for Bubble Town. Attractix begins collecting everything including Dondon! Dr. K chases his AWOL `bot, but the magnetic field of Attractix is too strong even for them!
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: マグピョンを助けろ! コンボック
